long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Design Boardz Pinning Extension allows users to save any image on the web directly into one of their design boards on their user profile.  After installing the extension, simply right click the desired image > click save > select the board to put it in > DONE.

The Design Boardz plug-in makes saving content for projects MUCH faster!
